hooks.command: bash -c 'FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$FILE" == */domain/* ]]; then VIOLATIONS=$(grep -nE "^import (org\.springframework|jakarta|javax)\.|^import com\.wakita181009\.cleanarchitecture\.(application|infrastructure|presentation)\." "$FILE" 2>/dev/null); if [[ -n "$VIOLATIONS" ]]; then echo "[LAYER VIOLATION] Forbidden import in domain layer:"; echo "$VIOLATIONS"; fi; fi'

bash -c 'FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$FILE" == */application/* ]]; then VIOLATIONS=$(grep -nE "^import (org\.springframework|jakarta|javax)\.|^import com\.wakita181009\.cleanarchitecture\.(infrastructure|presentation)\." "$FILE" 2>/dev/null); if [[ -n "$VIOLATIONS" ]]; then echo "[LAYER VIOLATION] Forbidden import in application layer:"; echo "$VIOLATIONS"; fi; fi'
